method.name: _v5
method.comment: 'Agrega una pizza a la gr√°fica con opciones de modificar el titulo, valor y color Dim chartP1 As chartPizza chartP1.Initialize chartP1.title = "ANDROID" chartP1.color = "#02AC66" chartP1.value = 200 Pizza1.addPizza(chartP1) Dim chartP2 As chartPizza chartP2.Initialize chartP2.title = "WINDOWS" chartP2.color = "#024A86" chartP2.value = 100 Pizza1.addPizza(chartP2) Dim chartP3 As chartPizza chartP3.Initialize chartP3.title = "LINUX" chartP3.color = "#FF689D" chartP3.value = 75 Pizza1.addPizza(chartP3) Dim chartP4 As chartPizza chartP4.Initialize chartP4.title = "MAC" chartP4.color = "#E7D40A" chartP4.value = 5 Pizza1.addPizza(chartP4)

method.name: _v6
method.comment: Limpia el objeto para agregar pizzas nuevas
